new_skill_specs.name: analyze_food_web_impact
new_skill_specs.purpose: Analyze a food web diagram to determine the impact on various species if a specific species is removed.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A dictionary mapping each species to its predicted impact (e.g., increase, decrease, extinction).
edge_cases: No direct predators or prey for the removed species
Circular dependencies in the food web

new_skill_specs.name: map_impact_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: Map the predicted impacts of species in a food web to the correct multiple-choice option.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the correct multiple-choice option.
edge_cases: Multiple options match the impact scenario
No options match the impact scenario

tests.input: ({'Crabs': 'decrease', 'Limpets': 'decrease', 'Dolphins': 'no change', 'Sea Gulls': 'no change', 'Star Fish': 'no change'}, [{'label': 'A', 'text': 'Crabs and limpets will decrease'}, {'label': 'B', 'text': 'Dolphins will increase'}, {'label': 'C', 'text': 'Sea gulls will become extinct'}, {'label': 'D', 'text': 'Star fish will increase'}])
